pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'RStudio' Addin for Removing Objects from the Global Environment Based on Patterns and Object Type // An 'RStudio' addin to assist with removing objects from the global environment. Features include removing objects according to name patterns and object type. During the course of an analysis, temporary objects are often created and this tool assists with removing them quickly. This can be useful when memory management within 'R' is important.
